text: 'Fractured landscape:' Abortions in the U.S. are increasing, despite 'drastic' bans. Despite abortion restrictions being implemented in 21 states since the overturning of Roe v. Wade, a new report from the Guttmacher Institute found that "abortions in the U.S. are increasing." An estimated 1,026,690 abortions were performed in the country in …
